places.name: Cox's Bazar
places.description: Cox's Bazar is the world's longest uninterrupted natural sandy beach, stretching over 120 kilometers. It is a popular tourist destination known for its breathtaking sunset views and serene atmosphere.

hotels.name: Royal Tulip Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa
hotels.description: A luxurious beachfront resort offering spacious rooms, a spa, multiple dining options, and a pool overlooking the Bay of Bengal.

places.name: Sundarbans
places.description: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is home to the Royal Bengal Tigers and offers unique wildlife and nature experiences.

hotels.name: Sundarbans Tiger Camp
hotels.description: An eco-friendly resort nestled in the heart of the Sundarbans, offering comfortable accommodations, guided tours, and wildlife experiences.

places.name: Saint Martin's Island
places.description: Saint Martin's Island is a small coral island in the Bay of Bengal. It is known for its pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant marine life, making it a popular destination for snorkeling and diving enthusiasts.

hotels.name: Blue Marine Resort
hotels.description: A beachfront resort offering comfortable rooms, a restaurant serving fresh seafood, and easy access to the island's attractions.

hotels.name: Coral View Resort
hotels.description: A cozy resort located near the beach, providing simple accommodations, a restaurant, and friendly staff.

places.name: Bandarban
places.description: Bandarban is a scenic hill district known for its lush green landscapes, tribal culture, and picturesque hiking trails. It offers stunning viewpoints, waterfalls, and the opportunity to explore indigenous communities.

hotels.name: Hillside Resort
hotels.description: A peaceful resort situated amidst nature, providing comfortable accommodations, a restaurant, and panoramic views of the surrounding hills.

hotels.name: Hill View Resort
hotels.description: A budget-friendly resort offering basic amenities, friendly service, and easy access to Bandarban's attractions.

places.name: Sylhet
places.description: Sylhet is a scenic city surrounded by tea gardens, hills, and waterfalls. It is famous for its vibrant culture, historical landmarks, and the enchanting beauty of the Sylheti countryside.

hotels.name: Rose View Hotel
hotels.description: A luxury hotel offering comfortable rooms, a rooftop restaurant with panoramic city views, a spa, and conference facilities.

hotels.name: Hotel Star Pacific
hotels.description: A modern hotel located in the heart of the city, providing comfortable accommodations, a restaurant, and meeting rooms.

places.name: Rangamati
places.description: Rangamati is a picturesque district located on the banks of the Kaptai Lake. It offers breathtaking views of the lake, hills covered in lush greenery, and opportunities for boating and exploring indigenous villages.

hotels.name: Parjatan Hotel
hotels.description: A government-run hotel overlooking the Kaptai Lake, offering comfortable rooms, a restaurant, and a range of amenities.

hotels.name: Hotel Sufia International
hotels.description: A well-known hotel in Rangamati, providing comfortable accommodations, a restaurant serving local and international cuisine, and friendly service.

places.name: Kuakata
places.description: Kuakata is a unique beach town located on the southernmost tip of Bangladesh. It is known for its panoramic views of the Bay of Bengal, pristine beach, and the spectacular sight of both sunrise and sunset.

hotels.name: Hotel Kuakata Inn
hotels.description: A budget-friendly hotel offering comfortable rooms, a restaurant serving local cuisine, and easy access to the beach.

hotels.name: Hotel Star International
hotels.description: A modest hotel located near Kuakata Beach, providing simple accommodations, a rooftop restaurant, and friendly staff.

places.name: Paharpur
places.description: Paharpur is home to the UNESCO World Heritage Site known as the Somapura Mahavihara. It is one of the largest and best-preserved Buddhist monasteries in South Asia, dating back to the 8th century.

hotels.name: Parjatan Motel
hotels.description: A government-operated motel located near the archaeological site, offering basic accommodations, a restaurant, and a peaceful environment.

hotels.name: Hotel Parbati International
hotels.description: A budget-friendly hotel in Paharpur, providing simple accommodations, a restaurant, and friendly service.

places.name: Jaflong
places.description: Jaflong is a scenic hill station known for its rolling hills, tea gardens, and the crystal-clear water of the Dawki River. It offers mesmerizing views, opportunities for boating, and glimpses of the indigenous Khasi community.

hotels.name: Jaflong Valley Resort
hotels.description: A riverside resort offering comfortable accommodations, a restaurant serving local cuisine, and beautiful views of the surrounding landscape.

hotels.name: Jaflong Rest House
hotels.description: A government-run rest house located in Jaflong, providing basic accommodations, a restaurant, and a peaceful atmosphere.

places.name: Rajshahi
places.description: Rajshahi is a historically rich city known for its archaeological sites, ancient temples, and mango orchards. It offers a glimpse into Bangladesh's cultural heritage and is home to the famous Puthia Temple Complex.

hotels.name: Hotel Nice International
hotels.description: A comfortable hotel located in the heart of Rajshahi, offering spacious rooms, a restaurant, and easy access to the city's attractions.

hotels.name: Chez Razzak
hotels.description: A cozy guesthouse with a traditional touch, providing comfortable accommodations, a restaurant serving local cuisine, and a warm ambiance.
